pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 救援隊は子供をしらみつぶしに捜した。
lessons.english: The rescue worker searched the area, looking for the child.

lessons.japanese: 救援隊が到着したとき彼はまだ生きていた。
lessons.english: He was still alive when the rescue party arrived.

lessons.japanese: 救援機は強風と酷寒に対処しなければならなかった。
lessons.english: The rescue flight had to reckon with strong winds and freezing temperatures.

lessons.japanese: もし彼の救援がなかったら、私たちは事業に失敗していただろう。
lessons.english: If it had not been for his help, we would have failed in our enterprise.

lessons.japanese: 被災地に救援物資が急送された。
lessons.english: Relief supplies were raced to the disaster area.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは直ちに我々の救援にやってきた。
lessons.english: They came presently to our rescue.

lessons.japanese: 赤十字は災害の被害者を直ちに救援する。
lessons.english: The Red Cross gets help to disaster victims without delay.

lessons.japanese: 救援隊は子供をしらみつぶしに捜した。
lessons.english: The rescue worker searched the area, looking for the child.

lessons.japanese: 救援隊が到着したとき彼はまだ生きていた。
lessons.english: He was still alive when the rescue party arrived.

lessons.japanese: 救援機は強風と酷寒に対処しなければならなかった。
lessons.english: The rescue flight had to reckon with strong winds and freezing temperatures.

lessons.japanese: もし彼の救援がなかったら、私たちは事業に失敗していただろう。
lessons.english: If it had not been for his help, we would have failed in our enterprise.

lessons.japanese: 赤十字は災害の被害者を直ちに救援する。
lessons.english: The Red Cross gets help to disaster victims without delay.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは直ちに我々の救援にやってきた。
lessons.english: They came presently to our rescue.

lessons.japanese: 被災地に救援物資が急送された。
lessons.english: Relief supplies were raced to the disaster area.

lessons.japanese: 救援作戦はオペレーション・トモダチと名付けられた。
lessons.english: The rescue operation was called "Operation Tomodachi".
